title: [Health] Cannabidiol (CBD) does not impair cognitive functioning when used in the treatment of children with intractable epilepsy. After one year of continuous CBD use, the researchers observed no significant changes in the cognitive performance or functional adaptive status of the participants.

[Health] Blood sample analysis showed that, two to five years after they gave birth, mothers of children with autism spectrum disorder (ASD) had several significantly different metabolite levels compared to mothers of typically developing children
